info.title: PRA Contract Marketing Cost
info.description:
You can read the Contract Marketing cost header and items.
Contract Marketing costs can be created or updated or deleted along with its detailed items based on combination of Contract/Contract & Well Completion/Contract & Measurement Point/Contract & Well Completion & Measurement Point along with Material and Validity Dates.

x-sap-shortText: Production and Revenue Contract Marketing Costs is an inbound service which allows create, update, delete and read of Contract Marketing costs

values.text: [Revenue Accounting - Oil and Gas Production(5NM)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/5NM " Link To BP ")
